thread.title: Ingress maker Niantic spins off from Google and raises up to $30M from Pokémon and Nintendo
thread.title_full: Ingress maker Niantic spins off from Google and raises up to $30M from Pokémon and Nintendo - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Ingress maker Niantic spins off from Google and raises up to $30M from Pokémon and Nintendo
text: Niantic, the Google-spawned company that created the popular mobile game Ingress, is spinning out on its own and it has raised up to $30 million from Nintendo, the Pokémon Company Group, and Google. Niantic makes “real world games,” or mobile titles that mix virtual gameplay with locations in the real world. Niantic has teamed up with […] »
